news_header: Several companies are set to report earnings on February 5, 2025, including Qualcomm, Arm Holdings, and O'Reilly Automotive, with varying forecasts and performance trends.
news_original_title: After-Hours Earnings Report for February 5, 2025 :  QCOM, ARM, ORLY, MCK, AFL, MET, ALL, SU, CTVA, CTSH, F, AVB
news_text: On February 5, 2025, companies like Qualcomm (QCOM), Arm Holdings (ARM), O'Reilly Automotive (ORLY), McKesson Corporation (MCK), Aflac (AFL), MetLife (MET), Allstate (ALL), Suncor Energy (SU), Corteva (CTVA), Cognizant (CTSH), Ford (F), and AvalonBay (AVB) are expected to report earnings. QCOM anticipates a 3.86% increase in earnings per share, while ARM expects a significant decrease of 44.83%. Other companies like ORLY, MCK, AFL, and MET also forecast increases, though some have missed expectations in previous quarters. Zacks Investment Research provides insights on Price to Earnings ratios, indicating potential growth compared to industry averages.
